name: Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

action.name: Multiattack
text: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

description: Source: Hoard of the Dragon Queen p. 91, Rise of Tiamat p. 90
